import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Calculator.css"; import Container from "@mui/material/Container"; import { Box } from "@mui/system"; export default function Calculator() { const [num, setNum] = useState(0); function inputNum(e) { var input = e.target.value; setNum(num + input); } function clear(e){ setNum (0); } return (

{num}
); }
